title: How to Clean Glassware With Rice

steps.headline: Add a little white vinegar to the glass.
Swirl the liquid around in the glass.
steps.description: Leave to sit for about half an hour.

steps.headline: Place the grains of rice in the glass.
Shake firmly to remove particles stuck on the glass.
steps.description: The action of the grain of rice and the vinegar will work to clean out the glass beautifully and leaves a sparkling clean finish.

text: Add a little white vinegar to the glass.  Swirl the liquid around in the glass. Leave to sit for about half an hour. Place the grains of rice in the glass.  Shake firmly to remove particles stuck on the glass. The action of the grain of rice and the vinegar will work to clean out the glass beautifully and leaves a sparkling clean finish.
